scenarios.symptom: Mains charger cannot move to listing-ready because the DoC is missing.
scenarios.rootCause: Supplier package omitted a product-specific EU Declaration of Conformity.
scenarios.firstOwner: Ops and compliance during pre-submission review
scenarios.businessImpact: High chance of launch delay and late document scramble.

scenarios.symptom: Wi-Fi camera evidence set references LVD/EMC only despite radio features.
scenarios.rootCause: Product classification treated a radio SKU as non-radio equipment.
scenarios.businessImpact: Hard blocker risk in marketplace compliance checks.

scenarios.symptom: Manual language matrix shows English-only files for Germany launch.
scenarios.rootCause: Localization was deferred until after listing submission prep.
scenarios.firstOwner: Ops and compliance during documentation handoff
scenarios.businessImpact: Potential compliance escalation and rework before go-live.

scenarios.symptom: Responsible Person identity differs across label, DoC, and account records.
scenarios.rootCause: Entity data changed in one system but not synchronized across artifacts.
scenarios.businessImpact: Authority-response friction and delayed issue resolution.

scenarios.symptom: Document bundle looks noisy with duplicates but still maps cleanly to the product.
scenarios.rootCause: Multiple supplier uploads created clutter without introducing contradictions.
scenarios.businessImpact: No launch blocker; demonstrates over-block prevention.
missingEvidence: None - evidence set is complete and consistent

scenarios.symptom: Borderline product function cannot be classified with high confidence from available metadata.
scenarios.rootCause: Insufficient technical detail to determine directive scope automatically.
scenarios.businessImpact: Requires manual decision before submission to avoid incorrect claims.

roleOutputs.summary: Prioritize blocked SKUs and submit only listing-ready products.
Resolve directive-linked evidence gaps with source-backed checks.
Align feed attributes and document metadata to avoid mismatch flags.
Validate traceability identity and documentation handoff readiness.
